hero.title: Kikendamowin miinawaa Mikwendamowin
hero.subtitle: Ikwewag, ikwezensag miinawaa Niizh Manidoowag Anishinaabeg

gallery.heading: Dibaajimowinan Nishinaabewin
gallery.intro: Niizhwaaching dibaajimowinan gaye, niwii-gikendamaan ezhi-bimaadiziwaad miinawaa ezhi-miinigoziwaad ji-maamawi-bimaadiziwaad noongom gii-miigaadiwag.
gallery.permissionNote: Giganawenimaanaanig gii-maajiishkaadaa dibaajimowinan gaye zhichigewaad waasa nitaa-mazina’igan.

helen.title: Helen Betty Osborne, 19
helen.description: Aakozi gii-mikwaabamin naawaji The Pas noongom 1971.

jessica.title: Jessica Michaels, 17
jessica.description: Odaawaawi’igewin ina gii-piitaadizid noongom 2001, odoodemag waa-gashkendamowad.

divas.title: Divas Boulanger, 24
divas.description: Gii-mikwaabamin gii-giishpinik Portage la Prairie noongom 2004.

phoenix.location: Onaakonigewin: Ochekiwi Sipi (Fisher River Cree Nation)
